sentences.sContent: As a lawyer, I would deprecate any sort of legal control on gene therapy at this stage.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a lawyer, I would deprecate any sort of legal control on gene therapy at this stage.
sentences.sCn: 作为律师，我会反对在现阶段对基因疗法进行任何形式的法律管制。

sentences.sContent: Though the environment doesn't have a mouth to deprecate what humans have done to her, she retaliates through action.
sentences.sContent_eng: Though the environment doesn't have a mouth to deprecate what humans have done to her, she retaliates through action.
sentences.sCn: 尽管环境没有嘴巴来反对人类对她所做的一切，她通过行动来报复。

synos.tran: 反对；抨击；轻视；声明不赞成

remMethod.val: de(去除) + prec(=preci 价值) + ate → 去掉价值 → 藐视

words.tran: 不赞成的；反对的；恳求的
对…表示不赞成；轻视（deprecate的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to strongly disapprove of or criticize something
